sentence: Last month, Cawthorn led the polls by 32 points against GOP candidate Chuck Edwards, 52 percent to 20 percent.
author: Patricia McKnight
title: National Rifle Association Throws Weight Behind Cawthorn Reelection

sentence: Last month, Cawthorn led the polls by 32 points against GOP candidate Chuck Edwards, 52 percent to 20 percent.

sentence: In the same statement, Tillis threw his weight behind Cawthorn's primary challenger, Chuck Edwards.
author: Cheryl Teh
title: North Carolina GOP senator calls for Madison Cawthorn's cryptocurrency purchases to be investigated by House Ethics Committee

sentence: In the same statement, Tillis threw his weight behind Cawthorn's primary challenger, Chuck Edwards.

title: North Carolina GOP senator calls for Madison Cawthorn's cryptocurrency purchases to be investigated by House Ethics Committee

sentence: Tillis has endorsed one of Cawthorn's primary opponents, state Senator Chuck Edwards, and a super PAC connected to Tillis has spent $300,000 on an ad campaign that accused Cawthorn of "lying about conservatives" and dubbed him an "attention-seeking embarrassment."
author: Darragh Roche
title: Madison Cawthorn Is Under Attack from the Right
